Title: Relates to the Inmates Responsibility and Fair Wages Act
Summary: Relates to the Inmates Responsibility and Fair Wages Act; establishes a minimum wage for inmates of five dollars per hour; establishes a prison inmate fund where up to forty percent of an inmate's wages can be sent to his or her family to help pay for certain expenses.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law and the state finance law, in relation to the Inmates Responsibility and Fair Wages Act
